settings.name: auth_token
settings.label: Auth Token
settings.description: API authorization token. You can find more info on how to obtain it [here](https://www.mercadopago.com.ar/developers/en/guides/overview)

settings.name: start_date
settings.label: Start Date
settings.description: The earliest record date to sync (default is yesterday).

settings.name: end_date
settings.label: End Date
settings.description: The latest record date to sync (default is the current date)

settings.name: base_url
settings.label: Base Url
settings.description: URL of the Mercado Pago API (default is https://api.mercadopago.com/v1")
